data_processing: Read 2 was aligned with Star v2.4.0
Each aligned read was tagged with its mate-pair UMI and cell barcode
Each aligned exonic read was tagged with a gene name
A digital expression matrix was built by counting the number of unique UMIs per gene within each cell; columns are cells, and rows are genes.
The first inflection point was estimated on a cumulative sum plot of the digital expression matrix to determine the number of cells in the sample
Samples Bipolar1-6 -- prepared from P17 Vsx2-GFP mouse retinas on two separate days (Bipolar1-4 and Bipolar5-6)--were merged together into a single matrix.
Supplementary_files_format_and_content: compressed, flat text file with tab delimiters

protocols.description: suspensions were processed through Drop-Seq to generate single-cell cDNA libraries attached to microbeads. Microbeads were counted, and amplified by PCR, and the 3' end of the cDNA prepared for sequencing using a modified Nextera XT protocol.

long_label: P17 Vsx2-GFP sorted mouse bipolar retina cells 1 (Batch 1)
